data.meta_description: Learn about Anna Maria Perez de Tagle on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Anna Maria Perez de Tagle, such as Fame.
data.text:
Lilly, Do You Want to Know a Secret?

Miley's other life as pop star Hannah Montana is uncovered by her best friend Lilly, who's annoyed that her friend kept it a secret from her, but after Miley offers to let Lilly borrow her clothes she decides to forgive her.

It's a Mannequin's World

Hannah sees a display of Hannah Montana clothes at the mall, and ends up pretending to be one of the mannequins to hide from her father.

Mascot Love

Lilly decides to be a cheerleader so she can spend more time with Miley, but then Miley becomes the team mascot and the opposite happens. Plus, Jackson undertakes a messy chore for money.

Ooo, Ooo, Itchy Woman

Miley, Lilly and Oliver get revenge on Amber and Ashley during a camping trip, but what they do rebounds on Miley in her Hannah Montana identity. Meanwhile, Jackson and Robbie have a mouse problem.

Achy Jakey Heart (Part 1 of 2)

Jake returns home to Malibu, and is eager to re-kindle his relationship with Miley. However, he soon learns that in this case absence hasn't necessarily made the heart grow fonder.
